import sys

#tupleZeroHole = ('C','E','F','G','H','I','J','K','L','M','N','S','T','U','V','W','X','Y','Z')
tupleOneHole = ('A','D','O','P','Q','R')
tupleTwoHoles = ('B')

T = int(raw_input())

while T>0:
    count = 0 
    text = raw_input()
    for char in text:
        if char in tupleOneHole:
            count+=1
        elif char in tupleTwoHoles:
            count+=2
    print count
    T-=1
